name: Max Trigger Strike
description:
Destroy as many enemy planes as possible! Watch out for their bullets and attacks. Are you ready? shoot!

Controls:🎮

Use the spacebar to pull the trigger and shoot.

Use the arrow keys to move your plane.

Mobile support: Tap your plane to move and shoot at the same time.

The P items can change the type of bullets on your plane for a few seconds:

🔴 Red P: missiles

⚪ White P: double shot
